testimonials.text: I have been learning programming from 2018. I am a self taught developer. I have learned Html, Css, Php, Javascript, NodeJs, React, Firebase, Next js, Mysql, Mongodb. I have done some projects. I also have some private project that i have done for the client. So I did not add all my projects on my portfolio

Now I want to develop my skills on programming more and more by working with new technologies in different projects. I am very much confident in this sector and I hope i will be able to reach my goal.
If you need more information about me, contact me via email. Thank you!
